config.banner: Hurrying through the rainswept November night, you're glad to see the bright lights of the Opera House. It's surprising that there aren't more people about but, hey, what do you expect in a cheap demo game...?

bar.name: Bar
bar.description: The bar, much rougher than you'd have guessed after the opulence of the foyer to the north, is completely empty. There seems to be some sort of message scrawled in the sawdust on the floor.
bar.success: The message, neatly marked in the sawdust, reads... YOU HAVE WON!

cloak.description: A handsome cloak, of velvet trimmed with satin, and slightly spattered with raindrops. Its blackness is so deep that it almost seems to suck light from the room.
cloak.name: Velvet cloak

foyer-n.name: north
foyer-n.failure: You've only just arrived, and besides, the weather outside seems to be getting worse.

foyer.nodrop: This isn't the best place to leave a smart cloak lying around.
foyer.description: You are standing in a spacious hall, splendidly decorated in red and gold, with glittering chandeliers overhead. The entrance from the street is to the north, and there are doorways south and west.
foyer.name: Foyer of the Opera House

foyer-s.name: south
foyer-s.failure: As you approach the doorway, all light seems to vanish. You backpedal in a hurry.

hook.name: Small brass hook
hook.description: It's just a small brass hook, screwed to the wall.
hook.failure: You consider getting a souvenir, but it's too well fastened.

cr.description: The walls of this small room were clearly once lined with hooks, though now only one remains. The exit is a door to the east.
cr.name: Cloakroom

meta.subtitle: A basic IF demonstration
meta.author: Roger Firth
meta.license: Adventure Prompt version by Felix Pleşoianu
meta.title: Cloak of Darkness
